sentences.text: Donald E. Brandt Chairman of the Board, President and Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Fellow Shareholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of our Board of Directors, management and employees, I invite you to participate in our 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting will be held at 10:30 a.m. (MST), Wednesday, May 17, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This year's Annual Meeting will be a completely virtual meeting of shareholders, which will be conducted via live webcast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will be able to attend the Annual Meeting online by visiting www.virtualshareholdermeeting.com/PNW.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You also will be able to vote your shares electronically during the Annual Meeting (other than shares held through our 401(k) Plan, which must be voted prior to the meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are looking forward to using the virtual Annual Meeting technology.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For those of you who have been able to join us at the past several physical meetings, you would have seen our shareholder attendance dwindling.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holding a virtual meeting will make the Annual Meeting available to all of our shareholders from any location.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A virtual meeting is also environmentally friendly and sustainable over the long-term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Details regarding how to attend the meeting online and the business to be conducted at the Annual Meeting are in the accompanying Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pinnacle West had another successful year in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Examples of our successes include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your Board increased the common dividend for the fifth straight year, raising it by 5%;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our total shareholder return was 25.3%, outperforming the S&P Composite 1500 Electric Utilities Index;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional highlighted accomplishments of our Company's 2016 performance are set forth in the Proxy Statement beginning on page 1.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our share price reached a new all-time closing high and new 52-week intraday highs on 27 trading days, including a new all-time intraday high; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our total shareholder value increased $1.8 billion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At this year's Annual Meeting, as explained in the attached Proxy Statement, we are asking you to: (1) elect eleven Board of Director nominees; (2) consider and vote FOR an advisory resolution to approve executive compensation; (3) consider and vote, on an advisory basis, on how frequently the Company should obtain future advisory votes on executive compensation; (4) re-approve the material terms of the performance goals under, and an amendment to, the 2012 Long-Term Incentive Plan; and (5) ratify the appointment of our independent public accounting firm for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Last, but not least, your vote is important to us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to participate in the Annual Meeting on the meeting day, we encourage you to vote promptly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote over the Internet; by telephone; by completing, signing, dating and returning a proxy card or voting instruction form; or by voting during the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for the confidence you place in Pinnacle West through your investment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kathryn L. Munro Lead Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To Our Shareholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of your Board of Directors, I welcome this opportunity to communicate with our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In stewarding your Company, we continually seek to achieve long-term, sustainable performance and create shareholder value by focusing on implementing effective business strategies, prudent risk management, and sound corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Don Brandt became our Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer in April 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He brought to the Company a focus on returning to our core business of operating and investing in a vertically integrated utility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has built a strong leadership team and our Company's performance under Don's and his team's leadership continues to be impressive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Here are several examples of our improved performance:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Total Shareholder Return.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since April 2009, our Company's total shareholder return (stock price appreciation plus dividends) ("TSR") has outperformed that of the S&P 1500 Electric Utility Index by over 158%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also during this period, the Company has delivered an annualized TSR of 19.7%, and ranked 4th when compared against the companies in our Peer Group (as defined on page 42 of the Proxy Statement but excluding from this comparison one company that was acquired in 2016);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Earnings Performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compounded annual growth rate of Pinnacle West's earnings from 200 to 2016 was 30.7% compared to 10.6% from 2002 to 2009;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Return on Equity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pinnacle West's average return on equity from 2010 to 2016 was 9.6% compared to 7.0% from 2002 to 2009;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dividend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2012, the Company began raising the dividend.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the past several years, the annual dividend increase has been approximately 5%; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APS's Credit Rating.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Standard and Poor's senior unsecured credit rating for APS was upgraded three levels since 2009 improving from BBB to the current A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I would now like to take this opportunity to highlight some areas of interest to our shareholders with respect to issues more specific to the Board and our shareholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continue to be an active and engaged Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our independent Board members are expected to be active, engaged and contributing members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our discussions are focused on oversight of Pinnacle West's business strategy; targeting the Company's critical areas of focus of shareholder value, operational excellence, environment, customer value, employees, and the communities we serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This year we held a combined total of 33 Board and Board committee meetings, including holding an all-day session at the Palo Verde Nuclear Power Generating Station.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the Board meetings, our directors have focused on our shareholder engagement program, participated in meetings held by the Palo Verde Off-Site Safety Review Committee and by the Institute of Nuclear Power Operations, and spoken at the Company's sponsored Women's Leadership Symposium.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We added Paula J. Sims to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In October 2016 we elected Paula Sims to the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Sims brings extensive experience to the Company in electric utility operations and utility regulation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In her prior roles at Progress Energy, Ms. Sims was responsible for business operations such as new generation, supply chain, and information technology, as well as overall processes and efficiency improvements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Her experience gives her insight into the operational, financial and regulatory matters that are of ever increasing significance to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We implemented a retirement age for directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have implemented a Director Retirement Policy that provides that no individual may be nominated for election to the Board of Directors who has attained the age of 75 years at the time of the nomination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering the terms of this policy, it was important to the Board that there be an orderly transition from the existing Board members to new Board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy as adopted will accomplish that transition.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have adopted proxy access in our Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We know that many of our shareholders are in favor of some form of proxy access and we have responded accordingly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We took a very measured and thoughtful approach in developing a proxy access Bylaw that we believe serves the needs of our shareholders while balancing the potential for injury to the effectiveness of the Board and by extension, the Company's operational performance and long-term growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy access Bylaw generally permits a shareholder, or a group of up to 20 shareholders, owning 3% or more of the Company's outstanding common stock continuously for at least three years, to nominate and include in the Company's proxy materials director nominees constituting up to 25% of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Engagement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your views always are, and will be, important to us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have continued our focus on strengthening our shareholder engagement program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will find the details on page 22 of the Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I appreciate the opportunity to provide you with an update and encourage you to read the Proxy Statement and Annual Report for more information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for your investment in Pinnacle West Capital Corporation and your continued support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of the 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 31, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2017 Annual Meeting of Shareholders (the "Annual Meeting") of Pinnacle West Capital Corporation ("Pinnacle West", "PNW", or the "Company") will be held at 10:30 a.m., Mountain Standard Time, on Wednesday, May 17, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting may be accessed online at www.virtualshareholdermeeting.com/PNW.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purposes of the Annual Meeting are:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) To elect eleven directors to serve until the 2018 Annual Meeting of Shareholders (Proposal 1);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) To hold an advisory vote to approve executive compensation (Proposal 2)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (3) To hold an advisory vote on the frequency of our shareholders advisory votes on executive compensation (Proposal 3);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (4) To re-approve the material terms of the performance goals under, and to approve an amendment to, the 2012 Long-Term Incentive Plan (Proposal 4);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (5) To ratify the appointment of our independent accountants for the year ending December 31, 2017 (Proposal 5); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (6) To transact such other business as may properly come before the Annual Meeting and at any adjournments or postponements thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shareholders of record at the close of business on March 9, 2017 are entitled to notice of and to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether you plan to participate in the Annual Meeting or not, please promptly vote by telephone, over the Internet, by proxy card, or by voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By order of the Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIANE WOOD Corporate Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Offices Address: PINNACLE WEST CAPITAL CORPORATION Post Office Box 53999 Phoenix, Arizona 85072-3999
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Statement Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This summary highlights our 2016 performance, our new and continuing corporate governance and executive compensation highlights, and certain information contained in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As it is only a summary, please read the complete Proxy Statement and 2016 Annual Report before you vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Proxy Statement and form of proxy are first being made available to shareholders on or about March 31, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Performance Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Company continued its strong performance in 2016 as evidenced by the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Value:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Pinnacle West increased the common dividend for the fifth straight year, raising it by 5%;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Pinnacle West's share price reached a new all-time closing high and new 52-week intraday highs on 27 trading days, including a new all-time intraday high;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Pinnacle West's earnings were $442 million, or $3.95 per share;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Our Company's TSR was solid, as shown by the graph below, outperforming the S&P Composite 1500 Electric Utilities Index in all periods shown;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Our total shareholder value increased over the last five years as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Statement Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Our stock continues its competitive performance, as shown by comparing our stock's performance to companies in the Edison Electric Institute Index (U.S. shareholder-owned electric utilities) and in the Standard and Poor's 500 Index:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Operating Performance:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Arizona Public Service Company ("APS") operates Palo Verde Nuclear Generating Station ("Palo Verde"), the largest nuclear generating station in the United States.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Palo Verde produced approximately 80% of Arizona's carbon-free energy;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Palo Verde generated 32.2 million megawatt-hours of electricity, marking the third consecutive year the plant has produced more than 32 million megawatt-hours, and it remains the only U.S. generating station to produce more than 30 million megawatt-hours in a year, a feat the plant has achieved each of the past eight years; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Palo Verde achieved an annual capacity factor of 93.2%;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APS completed the 40 megawatt Red Rock Solar Plant  APS's largest utility-scale solar plant
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o APS developed the first microgrid for the U.S. Navy, providing 25 megawatts of standby power;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Our diverse supplier program continues to be successful, with our 2016 spend exceeding $350 million.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We were recognized as the Corporation of the Year at the 2016 Women's Business Enterprise Council  West Annual Strategic Opportunity Conference; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Statement Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o APS gas and oil generation plants achieved a startup reliability of 99.3%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Customer Value:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o APS improved paperless billing adoption to 30% of our customers (or 363,000) compared to the U.S. average of 24% and the utility average of 19%;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o APS was named the Environmental Protection Agency ENERGY STAR Sustained Excellence partner for the 7th consecutive year based on the effective delivery of customer energy efficiency programs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APS contributed more than $10 million to Arizona communities, $2 million of which was invested in science, technology, math and engineering education programs across Arizona; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our employees contributed 120,000 volunteer hours, and APS was ranked 2nd by the Phoenix Business Journal on its list of Arizona's top corporate volunteer programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sustainability:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o In 2016 we continued to focus on advancing our priority sustainability initiatives: safety and security, energy innovation, carbon management, water resources, and people.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Examples of accomplishments in these areas include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Safety and Security:    In 2016 our employees achieved the fewest OSHA recordable injuries in Company history.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APS continued to take actions throughout the year to improve both our cybersecurity and security hardening of physical assets;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Energy Innovation:    APS's research and development pilot project that is studying the offset of peak energy usage with solar energy production was expanded to included four megawatts of grid scale battery storage devices;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Carbon Management:    APS continued to build renewable assets as a means of managing carbon emissions, surpassing a milestone of one gigawatt of solar energy capacity on our system.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APS expects to produce over 50% of our energy mix from carbon-free resources in 2017 from renewables, energy efficiency and nuclear generation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Water Resources:    APS focused on reducing the use of non-renewable water at its power generation plants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, the use of non-renewable water was 28% less than our baseline year of 2014; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: People:    APS's efforts to improve the workplace experience of our employees yielded positive results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We improved our 2016 employee engagement survey scores in all categories, including our overall engagement score, which placed us above other benchmarked utility organizations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To learn more about our sustainability efforts, please see our Corporate Responsibility Report located on our website (www.pinnaclewest.com).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Statement Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board and Governance Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board's performance and corporate governance remain strong.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our new and continuing highlights include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o We implemented our Director Retirement Age Policy, see page 21;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o We adopted proxy access;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o We continued our focus on strengthening our shareholder engagement process, see page 22;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o We hold annual elections of all directors (see page 7 of this Proxy Statement Summary for a list of the nominees);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Ten of our eleven directors are independent;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Our independent Lead Director has clearly defined and robust responsibilities;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Each of our directors attended at least 90% or more of the Board meetings and any Board committee meeting on which he or she served;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o We do not have a poison pill plan or similar anti-takeover provision in place; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Our directors and officers are prohibited from pledging or hedging our stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continue to evaluate and improve our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: New and continuing highlights in this area include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o We changed the allocation of the value of our annual long-term equity awards to 60% performance- based and 40% time-based vesting beginning with the 2016 awards;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o We added clawback provisions to our 2016 annual cash incentive plans and performance share equity grant agreements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o We limited the use of discretion to adjust incentive awards solely to the occurrence of unanticipated events that may arise during the performance period in the 2016 CEO Incentive Plan; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o We continued our executive compensation program's focus on being transparent with a clear emphasis on rewarding performance by putting pay at risk and retaining key
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Statement Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation philosophy incorporates the following core principles and objectives:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Alignment with shareholder interests;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key management retention;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A focus on a few key elements that are simple and understandable: base salary; an annual performance-based cash incentive; a three-year performance-based equity grant; a retention-based equity grant that releases over a four-year period; pension and supplemental pension retirement benefits; and limited perquisites;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant portion of our Named Executive Officers' (as identified on page 40 of this Proxy Statement) compensation is at risk and based on performance  our annual cash incentive plans are 100% tied directly to earnings, business unit performance and individual performance, and our performance shares are based on TSR and value-driving business metrics; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We use multiple business performance metrics, capped payouts and other features that are designed to reward performance but not encourage unacceptable risk taking.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: o Please see our "Compensation Discussion and Analysis" beginning on page 40 of this Proxy Statement for a detailed explanation of our executive compensation program.

sentences.text: For shares for which you are the beneficial owner but not the shareholder of record, you may change your vote by re-submitting a signed voting instruction form to your broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, for shares for which you are the beneficial owner but not the shareholder of record, you should contact your broker if you would like to revoke your vote.

sentences.text: Quorum
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence, in person or by proxy, of a majority of the outstanding shares of our common stock is necessary to constitute a quorum at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In counting the votes to determine whether a quorum exists, shares that are entitled to vote but are not voted at the direction of the beneficial owner (called abstentions) and votes withheld by brokers in the absence of instructions from beneficial owners (called broker non-votes) will be counted for purposes of determining whether there is a quorum.

sentences.text: Proxy Access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2017, our Board amended the Bylaws to provide, among other things, that under certain circumstances a shareholder or group of shareholders may include director candidates that they have nominated in our annual meeting proxy statement  "proxy access."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under these provisions, a shareholder or group of up to 20 shareholders seeking to include director nominees in our annual meeting proxy statement must own 3% or more of our outstanding common stock continuously for at least the previous three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally the number of qualifying shareholder-nominated candidates the Company will include in its annual meeting proxy materials will be limited to the greater of 25% of the Board or two candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the current Board size of 11 directors, the maximum number of proxy access candidates we would be required to include in our proxy materials is two.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominees submitted under the proxy access provisions that are later withdrawn or are included in the proxy materials as Board-nominated candidates will be counted in determining whether the 25% maximum has been reached.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the number of shareholder-nominated candidates exceeds 25%, each nominating shareholder or group of shareholders may select one nominee for inclusion in our proxy materials until the maximum number is met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The order of selection would be determined by the amount (largest to smallest) of shares of our common stock held by each nominating shareholder or group of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Requests to include shareholder-nominated candidates must be received by our Corporate Secretary not earlier than the close of business on November 1, 2017 nor later than the close of business on December 1, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of qualifying shareholder-nominated candidates the Company will include in its proxy materials under proxy access will be reduced on a one-for-one basis in the event the Company receives a Shareholder Nomination, but at least one qualifying shareholder- nominated proxy access nominee will be included in the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In all cases, shareholders and nominees must also comply with the applicable rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission ("SEC") and the applicable sections of our Bylaws relating to qualifications of nominees and nominating shareholders and disclosure requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Meetings and Attendance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016 each of our directors attended 90% or more of the Board meetings and any meetings of Board committees on which he or she served.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, our Board held eight meetings and each of our directors attended 90% or more of the Board meetings and any meetings of Board committees on which he or she served.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director is expected to participate in the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Committees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has the following standing committees: Audit; Corporate Governance; Finance; Human Resources; and Nuclear and Operating.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the charters of the Board's committees are publicly available on the Company's website (www.pinnaclewest.com).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our committees conduct a formal review of their charters every other year and as often as any committee member deems necessary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the years in which a formal review is not conducted, the Board has tasked management with reviewing the charters and recommending any changes management deems necessary or reflective of good corporate governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The charters are also changed as needed to comply with any corresponding changes to any applicable rule or regulation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents

sentences.text: INFORMATION ABOUT OUR BOARD AND CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our committees are comprised of independent directors who meet the independence requirements of the NYSE rules, SEC rules, and the Director Independence Standards, including any specific committee independence requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The duties and responsibilities of our committees are as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Appoints the independent accountants and is responsible for their qualifications, independence, performance (including resolution of disagreements between the independent accountants and management regarding financial reporting), and compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participates in the selection of the independent accountants' new lead engagement partner each time a mandatory rotation occurs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews the annual audited financial statements or quarterly financial statements, as applicable, and the "Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations" contained therein;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discusses with management and the independent accountants significant financial reporting issues and judgments made in connection with the preparation of the Company's financial statements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews the Company's draft earnings press releases, as well as financial information and earnings guidance provided to analysts and rating agencies;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discusses guidelines and policies to govern the process by which risk assessment and risk management is undertaken across the Company and periodically reviews the principal risks related to the Company's financial statements, audit functions and other major financial risk exposures; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews management's monitoring of the Company's compliance with the Company's Code of Ethics and Business Practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that each member of the Audit Committee meets the NYSE experience requirements and that Mr. Nordstrom, the Chair of the Audit Committee, and Mr. Fox are "audit committee financial experts" under applicable SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: None of the members of our Audit Committee, other than Mr. Fox, currently serve on more than three public company audit committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Fox currently serves on the audit committees of four public companies, including Pinnacle West.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has discussed with Mr. Fox the time and effort required to be devoted by Mr. Fox to his service on these committees and has affirmatively determined that such services do not impair Mr. Fox's ability to serve as an effective member of our Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviews and makes recommendations to the Board regarding shareholder proposals requested for inclusion in the Company's proxy materials;

sentences.text: Reviews and assesses the Company's Political Participation Policy, and then reviews the Company's policies and practices with respect to governmental affairs strategy and political activities in accordance with the Company's Political Participation Policy.

sentences.text: The Nuclear and Operating Committee:  Receives regular reports from management and monitors the overall performance of Palo Verde;

sentences.text: Monitors overall performance of the principal non-nuclear business functions of the Company and APS, including fossil energy generation, energy transmission and delivery, customer service, fuel supply and transportation, safety, legal compliance, and any significant incidents or events;

sentences.text: The Board's Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kathryn L. Munro serves as the Company's Lead Director and chairs the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Director performs the following duties and responsibilities as set forth in our Corporate Governance Guidelines:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Serves as a liaison between the Chairman of the Board (the "Chairman") and the independent directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advises the Chairman as to an appropriate schedule of Board meetings, reviews and provides the Chairman with input regarding agendas for the Board meetings and, as appropriate or as requested, reviews and provides the Chairman with input regarding information sent to the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Presides at all meetings at which the Chairman is not present, including executive sessions of the independent directors (which are regularly scheduled as part of each Board meeting) and calls meetings of the independent directors when necessary and appropriate;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversees the Board and Board committee self-assessment process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is available for appropriate consultation and direct communication with the Company's shareholders and other interested parties; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performs such other duties as the Board may from time to time delegate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These duties and responsibilities do not, however, fully capture Ms. Munro's active role in serving as our Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, Ms. Munro regularly speaks with the CEO, other members of the senior management team and members of the Board in between Board meetings on a variety of topics, and she serves as a liaison between the CEO and the independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Munro focuses the Board on key issues facing our Company and on topics of interest to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She takes the lead on director recruitment and has a formal annual call with each non-employee director to discuss the Board, its functions, its membership, the individual's plan with respect to his or her continuing Board service, and any other topic the individual desires to discuss with our Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Her leadership fosters a Board culture of open discussion and deliberation to support sound decision-making.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She also encourages communication between management and the Board to facilitate productive working relationships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Chairman and CEO Positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman is Donald E. Brandt, the Company's President and CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors believe that Mr. Brandt, as an experienced leader with extensive knowledge of the Company and our industry, serves as a highly effective conduit between the Board and management and that Mr. Brandt provides the vision and leadership to execute on the Company's strategy and create shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that separating the roles of the CEO and Chairman and appointing an independent Board Chairman at this time would simply create an additional level of unneeded hierarchy that would only duplicate the activities already being vigorously carried out by our Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board's Role in Risk Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Responsibility for the management of the Company's risks rests with the Company's senior management team.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board's oversight of the Company's risk management function is designed to provide assurance that the Company's risk management processes are well adapted to and consistent with the Company's business and strategy, and are functioning as intended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board focuses on fostering a culture of risk awareness and risk-adjusted decision-making and ensuring that an appropriate "tone at the top" is established.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board regularly discusses and updates a listing of areas of risk and a suggested allocation of responsibilities for such risks among the Board and the Board committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The charter for each of our committees requires each committee to periodically review risks in their respective areas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Top risks discussed by the Board and its committees in 2016 included cybersecurity, data privacy and ownership, and utility regulation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes it is important to look at the list fresh each year as part of a diligent risk review.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Receives periodic presentations from management about its assigned risk areas;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Receives information about the effectiveness of the risk identification and mitigation measures being employed; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discusses their risk reviews with the Board at least annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with the requirements of the NYSE's corporate governance standards, the Audit Committee periodically reviews the Company's major financial risk exposures and the steps management has taken to monitor and control such exposures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also reviews the comprehensiveness of the Board's risk oversight activities and the Company's risk assessment process, and plays a coordinating role designed to ensure that no gaps exist in the coverage by the Board committees of risk areas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Executive Risk Committee is comprised of senior level officers of the Company and is chaired by the Chief Financial Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other responsibilities, this Committee is responsible for ensuring that the Board receives timely information concerning the Company's material risks and risk management processes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Executive Risk Committee provides the Board with a list of the Company's top risks on an annual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The internal enterprise risk management group reports to the Vice President, Controller and Chief Accounting Officer, who reports to the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The internal risk management group is responsible for (1) implementing a consistent risk management framework and reporting process across APS, and (2) ensuring that the Executive Risk Committee is informed of those processes and regularly apprised of existing material risks and the emergence of additional material risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Resignation Policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We employ a plurality voting standard with a director resignation policy because we believe a majority voting policy is inconsistent with cumulative voting, which is mandated by the Arizona Constitution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to the election of directors, the Company's Bylaws provide that in an uncontested election, a director nominee who receives a greater number of votes cast "withheld" for his or her election than "for" such election will promptly tender his or her resignation to the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee is required to evaluate the resignation, taking into account the best interests of the Company and its shareholders, and will recommend to the Board whether to accept or reject the resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Company's Corporate Governance Guidelines, upon a substantial change in a director's primary business position from the position the director held when originally elected to the Board, a director is required to apprise the Corporate Governance Committee and to offer his or her resignation for consideration to the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee will recommend to the Board the action, if any, to be taken with respect to the tendered resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Retirement Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Company's Corporate Governance Guidelines, an individual shall not be eligible to be nominated for election or re-election as a member of the Board of the Company or APS if, at the time of the nomination, the individual has attained the age of 75 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This policy shall apply regardless of the source of the nomination or whether the nomination was made at a meeting of the Board of Directors, at an Annual Meeting or otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Codes of Ethics and APS Core Strategic Framework
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To ensure the highest levels of business ethics, the Board has adopted the Code of Ethics and Business Practices, which applies to all employees, officers and directors, and the Code of Ethics for Financial Executives, both of which are described below:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Code of Ethics and Business Practices ("Code of Ethics").
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees, directors and officers receive access to and training on the Code of Ethics when they join the Company or APS, as well as annual updates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Code of Ethics helps ensure that employees, directors and officers of the Company and APS act with integrity and avoid any real or perceived violation of the Company's policies and applicable laws and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company provides annual online training and examination covering the principles in the Code of Ethics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This training includes extensive discussion of the Company's values, an explanation of Company ethical standards, application of ethical standards in typical workplace scenarios, information on reporting concerns, assessment questions to measure understanding, and an agreement to abide by the Code of Ethics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All employees of the Company and APS and all of our directors complete the training.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Code of Ethics for Financial Executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has adopted a Code of Ethics for Financial Executives, which is designed to promote honest and ethical conduct and compliance with applicable laws and regulations, particularly as related to the maintenance of financial records, the preparation of financial statements, and proper public disclosure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: "Financial Executive" means the Company's CEO, Chief Financial Officer, Chief Accounting Officer, Controller, Treasurer, General Counsel, the President and Chief Operating Officer of APS, and other persons designated from time to time as a Financial Executive subject to the Code of Ethics for Financial Executives by the Chair of the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both codes are available on the Company's website (www.pinnaclewest.com).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company and APS have adopted Core, which is a strategic framework that sets forth the foundation from which we operate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It defines our vision, mission, critical areas of focus, and values.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APS's vision is to create a sustainable energy future for Arizona.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APS's mission is to safely and efficiently deliver reliable energy to meet the changing needs of our customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The critical areas of focus are employees, operational excellence, environment, customer value, community, and shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The framework affirms our corporate values of safety, integrity and trust, respect and inclusion, and accountability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Here is our Core:

sentences.text: Director Qualifications and Selection of Nominees for the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Bylaws and the Corporate Governance Guidelines contain Board membership criteria that apply to nominees recommended for a position on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Bylaws, a director must be a shareholder of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In determining whether an individual should be considered for Board membership, the Corporate Governance Committee considers the following core characteristics:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: High Standards:  We look for directors that set high standards and expectations for themselves and others and the accomplishment of those standards and expectations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Informed Judgment:  Directors should be thoughtful in their deliberations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We look for directors who demonstrate intelligence, wisdom and thoughtfulness in decision-making.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Their decision-making process should include a willingness to thoroughly discuss issues, ask questions, express reservations and voice dissent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Integrity and Accountability:  Directors should act with integrity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We look for directors who have integrity and strength of character in their personal and professional dealings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our directors should be prepared to be, and are held, accountable for their decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Time and Effort:  Directors should spend the necessary time to properly discharge their responsibilities as directors, including reviewing written materials provided to the Board or committee in advance of Board or committee meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are expected to be present at all Board meetings, the Annual Meeting of Shareholders, and meetings of committees on which they serve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also expect our directors to make themselves accessible to management upon request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Commitments:  We expect our directors to monitor their other commitments to assure that these other commitments do not impact their service to our Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors may not serve on more than three other boards of public companies in addition to the Pinnacle West Board without the prior approval of the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director may not serve as a member of the Audit Committee if they serve on the audit committees of more than three public companies (including the Company) unless the Board determines that such simultaneous service would not impair the ability of such member to effectively serve on the Company's Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership:  We expect our directors to have investments in the Company's stock that aligns with our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our directors are expected to comply with our Director Stock Ownership Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Corporate Governance Committee considers the following qualities, among others: knowledge, including regulatory and political knowledge, and nuclear expertise at the strategic level; understanding of the Company's business environment; and the potential contribution of each candidate to the diversity of backgrounds, experience and competencies which the Board desires to have represented, including large organizational leadership, public company experience and risk oversight skills.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee considers diversity in its selection of nominees utilizing a broad meaning to include not only factors such as race and gender, but also background, experience, skills, accomplishments, financial expertise, and professional interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee uses a variety of methods to identify and evaluate nominees for a director position.

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee regularly assesses the appropriate size of the Board, whether any vacancies on the Board are expected due to retirement or otherwise, and whether the Board reflects the appropriate balance of knowledge, skills, expertise, and diversity required for the Board as a whole.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that vacancies are anticipated, or otherwise arise, the Corporate Governance Committee may consider various potential candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Candidates may be considered at any point during the year and come to the attention of the Corporate Governance Committee through current Board members, professional search firms or shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee evaluates all nominees from these sources against the same criteria.

sentences.text: Other than Ms. Sims, all directors were elected at the 2016 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.

sentences.text: Candidates who passed the initial screening tests were then interviewed by members of the Corporate Governance Committee and by Mr. Brandt.

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee recommended Ms. Sims for Board membership, and Ms. Sims was added to the Board in October 2016.

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 1  ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NYSE rules require companies whose securities are traded on the NYSE to have a majority of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These rules describe certain relationships that prevent a director from being independent and require a company's board of directors to make director independence determinations in all other circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company's Board has also adopted Director Independence Standards to assist the Board in making independence determinations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These Director Independence Standards are available on the Company's website (www.pinnaclewest.com).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the Board's review, the Board has determined that one of the Company's directors is not independent and that all of the other directors are independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent directors are Messrs. Fox, Gallagher, Lopez, Nordstrom, and Wagener, Drs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cortese, Herberger and Klein, and Mses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Munro and Sims.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Brandt is not independent under the NYSE rules or the Director Independence Standards because of his employment with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ten of our eleven directors are independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the NYSE rules and the Director Independence Standards, the Board undertakes an annual review to determine which of its directors are independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The review generally takes place in the first quarter of each year; however, directors are required to notify the Company of any changes that occur throughout the year that may impact their independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Cortese is an employee of Arizona State University ("ASU") in his capacity as the Director of the ASU Health Care Delivery and Policy Program and a Foundation Professor in the Department of Biomedical Informatics, Ira A. Fulton School of Engineering and in the School of Health Management and Policy, W.P. Carey School of Business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ASU is considered a part of the reporting entity for the State of Arizona (the "State") for financial reporting purposes and, as such, the State is the entity considered in applying the independence tests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering the independence of Dr. Cortese, the Board considered the fact that transactions between the State and the Company and its affiliates consist of providing electric service, the payment of various State fees, taxes, memberships, licenses, sponsorships and donations, and the payment by each party of utility-related costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board determined that these matters do not impact Dr. Cortese's independence, since amounts paid to or received from the State are less than the dollar thresholds set forth in the NYSE rules and the Director Independence Standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Dr. Cortese did not and does not benefit, financially, directly or indirectly, from ASU's business relationships with the Company, most of which consist of receiving electric service at regulated rates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dr. Cortese is independent under the tests imposed by the NYSE rules and our Director Independence Standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 1  ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Fox serves as a director of Univar, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APS purchases chemicals that are used in the operation and maintenance of our power plants, primarily in controlling our water chemistry, from Univar.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, since:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the amounts paid to Univar were less than the dollar thresholds set forth in the NYSE rules and our Director Independence Standards and were less than one percent of the Company's and Univar's revenues for fiscal year 2016;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the relationship between APS and Univar pre-dates Mr. Fox joining the Board; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) our purchases from Univar are negotiated at arm's length, the Board determined that these transactions do not impact Mr. Fox's independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Fox is independent under the tests imposed by the NYSE rules and our Director Independence Standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In considering the independence of Mr. Gallagher, the Board considered that the law firm of Gallagher & Kennedy, where Mr. Gallagher is Chairman Emeritus, provided legal services to the Company in 2016 and is expected to provide legal services to the Company in 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, since:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the amounts paid to Gallagher & Kennedy were less than the dollar thresholds set forth in the NYSE rules and the Director Independence Standards, and were less than one percent of the Company's and Gallagher & Kennedy's revenues for fiscal year 2016;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) Mr. Gallagher does not furnish legal services to the Company; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) he has advised the Company that he receives no compensation or benefits from Gallagher & Kennedy as a result of the firm providing legal services to the Company, the Board determined that Mr. Gallagher was independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Gallagher is independent under the tests imposed by the NYSE rules and our Director Independence Standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Gallagher has no involvement in legal services provided to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to all of the directors, the Board considered that many of the directors and/or businesses of which they are officers, directors, shareholders, or employees are located in APS's service territory and purchase electricity from APS at regulated rates in the normal course of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board considered these relationships in determining the directors' independence, but, because the rates and charges for electricity provided by APS are fixed by the Arizona Corporation Commission (the "ACC"), and the directors satisfied the other independence criteria specified in the NYSE rules and the Director Independence Standards, the Board determined that these relationships did not impact the independence of any director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also considered contributions to charitable and non-profit organizations where a director also serves as a director of such charity or organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, since no director is also an executive officer of such charitable or non-profit organization, the Board determined that these payments did not impact the independence of any director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Related Party Transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee is responsible for reviewing and approving all transactions with any related party, which consists of any of our directors, director nominees, executive officers, shareholders owning more than 5% of the Company's common stock and, with respect to each of them, their immediate family members and certain entities in which they are an officer or a shareholder, partner, member or other participant who, directly or indirectly, has a substantial ownership interest in or otherwise substantially controls or shares control of such entity (a "Related Party").
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This obligation is set forth in writing in our Statement of Policy Regarding Related Party Transactions (the "Policy").
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To identify Related Party Transactions, as defined in the Policy, each year the Company requires our directors and officers to complete director and officer questionnaires identifying any transactions with the Company in which a Related Party has an interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We review Related Party Transactions due to the potential for a conflict of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A conflict of interest occurs when an individual's private interest interferes, or appears to interfere, in any way with our interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Code of Ethics requires all directors, officers, and employees who may have a potential or apparent conflict of interest to notify the Company's management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Policy specifically provides that any Related Party Transaction must be approved or ratified by the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A "Related Party Transaction" is any transaction or a series of similar transactions in which the Company or any of its subsidiaries is or was a participant, where the amount involved exceeds $120,000 in the aggregate, and in which any Related Party has a direct or indirect material interest, other than:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transactions in which rates or charges are fixed in conformity with law or governmental authority (such as APS rates approved by the ACC);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transactions in which the rates or charges are determined by competitive bid; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The payment of compensation by the Company to the executive officers, directors, or nominees for directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the Policy, SEC rules, and our review, we had no Related Party Transactions in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee submitted the following report:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee is composed of non-employee directors, each of whom is independent as defined by NYSE rules and the Company's Director Independence Standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with SEC rules, the Human Resources Committee discussed and reviewed the Compensation Discussion and Analysis with management and, based on those discussions and review, the Human Resources Committee recommended to the Board that the Compensation Discussion and Analysis be included in this Proxy Statement.

sentences.text: Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Discussion and Analysis ("CD&A")
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Philosophy and Objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation program is designed to be transparent with a clear emphasis on putting pay at risk and retaining key executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation philosophy incorporates the following core principles and objectives:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Alignment with Shareholder Interests.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We structure our annual cash and long-term equity incentive compensation to put pay at risk and reward performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payouts under these plans are tied predominantly to the Company's total return to shareholders, earnings, and the achievement of measurable and sustainable business and individual goals, so that executives' interests are tied to the success of the Company and are aligned with those of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key Management Retention.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We structure our program to provide compensation at levels necessary to attract, engage and retain an experienced management team who have the skill sets to succeed in our complex operating and regulatory environment, including operating Palo Verde, and to provide consistently strong operating and financial results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: David P. Falck, Executive Vice President and General Counsel of PNW and APS; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mark A. Schiavon
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Highlights of our Compensation Program:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2016 Annual Meeting, our shareholders approved the compensation of our Named Executive Officers with an advisory vote of more than 93%, excluding abstentions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee (for purposes of this CD&A, the "Committee") was cognizant of this result in its consideration of the key components, design, implementation and amounts of our compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some highlights of our program are:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in Allocation  we increased the proportion of our annual long-term equity awards that is allocated to performance-based measures from 55% to 60%, with the remaining 40% allocated to time- based vesting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clawbacks  we added explicit clawback provisions to our 2016 annual cash incentive plans and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: performance share equity grant agreements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 40                   2017 Proxy Statement   |
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Limit Discretion on Adjustments  we limited the use of discretion to adjust incentive awards solely to the occurrence of unanticipated events (there were none in 2016) that may arise during the performance period in the 2016 CEO Incentive Plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay for Performance  a significant portion of our Named Executive Officers' compensation is at risk and based on performance  our annual cash incentive plans are 100% tied directly to earnings, business unit performance and individual performance, and our performance shares are based on total shareholder return and value-driving business metrics;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Simple and Understandable  we focus on a few key elements for our program that are simple and understandable: base salary; an annual performance-based cash incentive; a three-year performance-based equity grant; a retention-based equity grant that releases over a four-year period; and pension and supplemental pension retirement benefits;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Limited Perquisites  we offer limited perquisites; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Excessive Risk-Taking  we use multiple business performance metrics, capped payouts and other features that are intended to reward performance but not encourage unacceptable risk taking.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Overview of 2016 Company Performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pinnacle West is a holding company that derives essentially all of its revenues and earnings from our wholly-owned subsidiary, APS, a vertically-integrated electric utility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pinnacle West's 2016 earnings were $442 million, or $3.95 per share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional 2016 accomplishments are discussed in the Proxy Statement Summary under the heading "2016 Performance Highlights."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Setting Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Human Resources Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee monitors executive officer compensation throughout the year and undertakes a thorough analysis of our executive officer compensation each Fall.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This review includes consideration of competitive positions relative to specified labor markets, the mix of compensation components, performance requirements, the portion of pay at risk and tied to performance, and individual performance evaluations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From December through February, the Committee considers and approves executive officer compensation, including salary and cash and non-cash incentives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Role of Executive Officers in Determining Executive Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee makes all compensation decisions relating to our CEO's compensation, makes awards under the 2012 Plan, and determines the awards under the 2016 Incentive Plans, as defined later in this CD&A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee recommends other executive officer compensation decisions, which are approved by the Board for Pinnacle West officers and the Board of Directors of APS for APS officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management works with the Committee in establishing the agenda for Committee meetings and in preparing meeting information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management conducts evaluations and provides information on the performance of the executive officers for the Committee's consideration and provides such other information as the Committee may request.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management also assists the Committee in recommending: salary levels; annual incentive plan structure and design, including earnings and business unit performance targets or other goals; long-term incentive plan structure and design, including award levels; and the type, structure, and amount of other awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The executive officers are available to the Committee's compensation consultant to provide information as requested by the consultant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the request of the Chair of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Role of Compensation Consultants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee's charter gives the Committee the sole authority to retain and terminate any consulting firm used by the Committee in evaluating non-employee director and officer compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee engaged Frederick W. Cook & Co. to assist the Committee in its evaluation of 2016 compensation for our executive officers (the "Consultant").
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Consultant does not provide any other services to the Company or its affiliates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee has assessed the independence of the Consultant and has concluded that the Consultant is an independent consultant to the Committee as determined under the NYSE rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee instructed the Consultant to prepare a competitive analysis of the compensation of the executive officers of the Company and of APS, and to make recommendations for changes to the existing compensation program, if warranted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Determining The Peer Group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a regular part of the executive compensation review process, the Committee reviews the peer group annually for its continued appropriateness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of such review, the Committee approved the use of the same peer group that was used in setting 2015 executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Peer Group is broadly similar to the Company in scope and complexity of operations (taking into account nuclear operations, regulatory profile, and other quantitative and qualitative considerations) and positions the Company close to the median with respect to revenues (adjusted as explained below).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the Peer Group consisted of the following predominantly rate-regulated utilities (the "Peer Group"):
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Peer Group
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Alliant Energy Corporation   Ameren Corporation   Consolidated Edison, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DTE Energy Company Edison International   Eversource Energy (formerly known as Northeast Utilities)   Hawaiian Electric Industries, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NiSource Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: OGE Energy Corp.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PPL Corporation   SCANA Corporation   The Southern Company TECO Energy, Inc. (acquired by Emera, Inc. in July 2016)   WEC Energy Group, Inc. (formerly known as Wisconsin Energy Corporation)   Xcel Energy, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In determining both the composition of the Peer Group and the Company's relative position to that group, the number used for APS revenues was adjusted to take revenues attributable to managed assets that APS manages on behalf of itself and other owners, in addition to revenues attributable to assets that APS wholly owns, into account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This adjustment was based on the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Palo Verde is the United States' largest nuclear generating facility, with a net generation rating of approximately 4,000 megawatts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Palo Verde has seven utility owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APS owns or leases the largest share of the station (29.1%).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APS is responsible for the operation of 100% of the facility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Four Corners is a 2-unit coal-fired plant located in New Mexico, with a net generation rating of approximately 1,540 megawatts, of which APS owns 63%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Similar to Palo Verde, APS is responsible for the operation of 100% of the facility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While APS contracts with the other owners of these power stations for reimbursement of costs attributable to their ownership shares, as the sole operator APS is subject to additional business and legal risks and operational requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some of these risks and requirements include plant-wide procurement activities, legal and regulatory compliance, safety and security assurance and programs, and hiring and supervising the large workforces necessary to operate these facilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To reflect this expanded scope of responsibility and risk, APS used a number of $5.2 billion compared to its reported twelve months ending June 30, 2015 revenues of $3.5 billion for determining the Peer Group and its position in the Peer Group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The adjustment placed APS near the median of the Peer Group for revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee believes that the senior executives of the Company face challenges in the operation of Palo Verde that require skill sets similar to those of executives at larger Peer Group companies with significant nuclear operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consultant's Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Consultant reviewed our executive compensation practices and considered the extent to which these practices support our executive compensation objectives and philosophy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of this study, the Consultant performed competitive pay comparisons for our executive officers based on:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2014 compensation information as disclosed in 2015 SEC filings for the Peer Group;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General industry data based on surveys published by Aon Hewitt (averaging data for companies in the $2.5 billion to $5 billion revenue bracket and the $5 billion to $10 billion revenue bracket) and Towers Watson & Co. (now known as Willis Towers Watson PLC ("Towers Watson")) (averaging data for companies in the $3 billion to $6 billion revenue bracket and the $6 billion to $10 billion revenue bracket); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Industry-specific survey data from the Towers Watson Energy Services Industry Survey (reflecting the average between companies in the $3 billion to $6 billion revenue bracket and companies with revenues greater than $6 billion).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From these sources, the Consultant developed a consensus in which the competitive industry comparison for Messrs. Brandt, Hatfield, Falck, and Schiavoni reflects a weighting of one-third proxy statement data, one-third Energy Services Industry Survey, and one-third general industry surveys.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Edington did not have a general industry survey match, so his competitive industry comparison reflects a weighting of one-half proxy statement data and one-half Energy Services Industry Survey.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation levels were updated to July 2016 based on projected executive-level market movement from major salary-planning surveys selected by the Consultant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In providing information to the Committee with respect to setting 2016 compensation, the Consultant reviewed the total compensation of the Named Executive Officers and presented its analysis in October 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Consultant also reviewed the individual elements of compensation, including the type of annual incentives and long-term incentives, and evaluated the competitiveness of the individual elements of compensation of each such officer based on the survey data discussed above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
